EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-10-17-VMworld Europe.EMAIL-VMworld Booth Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic at VMworld Europe | Win an Oculus Rift, Nvidia Shield & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See Turbonomic at VMworld 2016 Your Chance to Win the Best Swag This year at VMworld Europe we will be giving away some of the greatest swag you have ever seen: a BB-8, a NVIDIA Shield and an Oculus Rift each day of the event. Want to increase your chances on winning these top items? Simply join The Green Circle Community <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-eu-2016&utm_content=10132016]]>.
Throughout VMworld, complete Online missions <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3267]]> to earn points that you can then redeem for the prizes or extra entries into the daily giveaway.
But why wait until next week, log in <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=desired-swag-eu-2016&utm_content=10132016]]> to the Green Circle Community and start earning points towards your swag today! Turbonomic
500 Boylston St, 8th Floor
Boston, MA
02116
